title: Forces - Effect of incline angle on F a and d

content.description: Which of the following describes the changes, if any, in the net force exerted on the block, the acceleration of the block, and the distance the block travels in time <math alttext="t" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi></math> ?
content.question: Net Force Acceleration Distance A Decreases Decreases Decreases B Decreases Increases Increases C Increases Decreases Decreases D Increases Increases Increases

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
